data.actual_result: The full pop up explaining that the email as been sent should appear.
data.expected_result: A button with the text "OKAY" appears at the top of the screen.
data.short_description: [iPhone only] Forgot your password button shows just an "OKAY" button at top of the screen.
data.steps_to_repro: - Log out of your own account.- Click on Login- Put in a random email address (ex. johnthecat0293290@randomemail.com or something related to that.)- Click on Forget Password
